fields.name: crunchy chocolate cake
fields.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake filled and topped with crunchy chocolate-covered Rice Krispies, frosted with silky whipped chocolate ganache â€” the ultimate treat for chocolate lovers. (450g).

fields.name: Groundnut sweets
fields.description: Discover the groundnut sweets are made with freshly roasted peanuts coated in a rich golden caramel, creating the perfect balance of crunch and sweetness. Every bite is packed with natural nutty flavor and a satisfying snap.

fields.name: Fish Pie
fields.description: Taste the baked Fish Pie! A golden, flaky pastry filled with a flavorful blend of spiced fish, onions, peppers, and aromatic herbs. Soft inside yet crisp outside, every bite delivers a burst of savory goodness. (450g)
